title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
Auntie Ethel. You will have the following dialogue options.

Let me - I'll bring Mayrina home. You're on your own. I have enough problems. I'm sorry. I wish you luck in finding her.

Choosing dialogue 1 will make the Johl skeptical, you will gain approval from Karlach, but disapproval from Lae'zel. Head to the riverside teahouse at Putrid Bog (X:-44 Y:268), to confront Auntie Ethel. When you enter her house, you will have the following dialogue options.

You must have mistaken me for someone els
